subject: Re: Transfering my recorded session to my computer
author: itcdeadpeople
full_text:
That makes PERFECT sense, Kay.  

LOL - I sometimes like to take my Voice 2000s DA300 recorder in the car with me.  I don't 
sweep in the car, but I do have a CD that I burned with Portuguese crowd babble on it, 
which I have played in the car and gotten interesting results.  Though there is something 
about that recorder and my car (a Prius) which is odd, all on it's own... even without 
background.  ;-)

Margaret

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "psfponies" <psfponies@...> wrote:
>
> Thanks Margaret
> 
> I like to use a portable recorder so don't have to be chained to the 
> computer to record a session also I live in an area where I don't 
> always get good reception so I like to try different areas of my house 
> and its easier to move a recorder around then my computer!! 
> 
> Kay
>
